creditline: Acquired through the Minnesota Museum Property Act
description: map of England in an oval with counties delineated with colored embroidered borders and black stitched names; scrolling tan ribbon with flower branches at bottom; leafy and flowered swags with tan ribbon at top and along sides; two small roundels in top corners--scene on left of two men--one on horseback, on standing--with a pair of columns with lintel in background; right scene is a woman with a spear leaning on a shield with the Union Jack, with a cornucopia at right and a ship at left; cream silk ground; edges nailed to wooden stretcher boards
medium: Plain weave silk with silk twist and chenille embroidery
title: Map of England and Wales
